// URL : http://www.codechef.com/problems/DIGROT

#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;

int cal_k(int x)
{
		int k = 1;
		while(x)
		{
			x /= 10;
			k *= 10;
		}
		k /= 10;		
		return k;
}

int left_rotate(int m)
{
		int rm = m % 10;
		int k = cal_k(m);
		int new_num = rm * k + m / 10;
		return new_num;
}

int right_rotate(int m)
{
			int k = cal_k(m);
			int rm = m / k;
			int new_num = (m % k) * 10 + rm;
			return new_num;
}

int main()
{
	int tc;
	cin >> tc;
	while(tc--)
	{
		int n;
		cin >> n;
		int m = n, tx;
		int mx = -1;
		
		tx = left_rotate(right_rotate(m));
		if(tx > mx)mx = tx;
		
		tx = right_rotate(left_rotate(m));
		if(tx > mx)mx = tx;
		
		for(int i = 0; i < 9; ++i)
		{
			m = left_rotate(m);
			if(m > mx)mx = m;
		}
		m = n;
		for(int i = 0; i < 9; ++i)
		{
			m = right_rotate(m);
			if(m > mx)mx = m;
		}
		cout << mx << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
